catalog_info.title: Black Holes, String Theory and the Fundamental Laws of Nature
catalog_info.prereq: Course open to Freshman Students Only
catalog_info.description: This seminar will review both our established knowledge of the fundamental laws of nature as well as our best guesses and attempts to understand what might lie beyond our current knowledge. The black hole information puzzle, the nature of space and time at short distances, string theory, the Higgs boson, unification of the forces, quantum gravity and the origin of the universe will be among the topics covered.
